subject.identity_lock: young athletic woman with long platinum-blonde hair, fair skin with a light tan, soft feminine facial features (defined jawline, high cheekbones, natural lips), gym-trained fit body (toned shoulders, visible abs, strong legs and glutes)

face_lock.shape: soft-oval with defined jawline and high cheekbones
face_lock.eyes: almond slightly upturned, hazel (green-brown), sharp catchlights, clean lash detail
face_lock.lips: full with defined cupid’s bow, warm nude-rose satin finish
face_lock.skin: real micro-texture visible (pores/peach fuzz/tiny blemishes), natural highlight roll-off, not airbrushed
face_lock.gaze: looking back over shoulder directly into the camera (face fully readable)

subject.hair: platinum-blonde pigtails tucked under a plain white tennis cap, a few loose strands framing cheeks, slight breeze movement (frozen sharp)

wardrobe.cap: plain white tennis cap, no logo, brim lifted so eyes are visible

bikini.rule: opaque sporty swim fabric (NOT see-through), tasteful coverage, no lingerie look
bikini.color: clean white (option: very thin blush piping only)

top.style: sporty bralette bikini top (or triangle-bralette hybrid)
top.support: visible underband seam + believable support; straps taut (no floating)
top.fabric_detail: matte swim knit texture, subtle stitching, realistic tension

bottom.fit: secure elastic edges, realistic stretch, sits high on hip, no malfunction
bottom.fabric_detail: opaque swim knit, clean seams, no transparency

footwear.socks: white ankle socks, knit texture visible
footwear.shoes: white tennis sneakers, minimal, no branding

prop.detail: real strings and grommets, slight wear on grip tape, no brand text

pose.concept: between-points tease at the net (sporty but sexy via body language)
pose.position: right beside the net near the post / net tape corner
pose.camera_relation: rear three-quarter angle (hips slightly closer to camera), torso twists so face is clear

lower_body.stance: one leg straight bearing weight, the other leg bent with toe lightly touching the court
lower_body.hip_line: subtle hip pop toward camera (tasteful), natural pelvis tilt (not exaggerated)
lower_body.feet: support foot planted; bent-leg toe pointed lightly; proportions natural

upper_body.lean: light lean into the net tape (forearms/hand contact), net remains straight and believable
upper_body.torso: gentle twist at waist to show side body while keeping full face readable

arms_hands.net_hand: one forearm/hand resting on net tape at waist-to-rib height
arms_hands.racket_hand: racket resting on shoulder, elbow relaxed outward (does not block face)

pose.head: turned back over shoulder for the wink; chin slightly down, eyes up to camera

court.surface: bubblegum/pastel PINK matte acrylic tennis court
court.lines: crisp white regulation lines, correct perspective/vanishing point
court.micro_realism: subtle grit texture, faint ball scuffs, light shoe marks near service box (clean but real)

net.mesh: taut net with visible weave (no warping)
net.tape: clean white top band, correct cable tension
net.post: matte metal post, bolts visible, slight wear

elements: optional very far silhouettes only (no identifiable faces)
background.depth_rule: background is softly out of focus but believable; not empty, not studio-clean

lighting.quality: warm rim light on hair/shoulders, soft shadows, natural contrast
lighting.rules: no HDR glow, no neon oversaturation, preserve highlight detail on cap/net tape

camera.position: LOW angle (around knee height), slight upward tilt
camera.framing: cap to upper-thigh, subject fills ~75–80% of frame, net band behind waist
camera.focus: tap-to-focus on near eye; lock focus/exposure on face
camera.anti_blur: fast shutter to freeze wink + breeze + net contact; subject must be tack sharp
camera.artifacts: mild natural grain in shadows, gentle smartphone sharpening (not crunchy), realistic compression
